name: autoconf
description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependent_to.name: stat
dependent_to.description: Library to create, manipulate, and export graphs Graphlib.

dependent_to.name: dcap
dependent_to.description: dCache access protocol client library.

dependent_to.name: evemu
dependent_to.description:
The evemu library and tools are used to describe devices, record data,
create devices and replay data from kernel evdev devices.

dependent_to.name: gtksourceview
dependent_to.description:
GtkSourceView is a GNOME library that extends GtkTextView, the standard
GTK+ widget for multiline text editing. GtkSourceView adds support for
syntax highlighting, undo/redo, file loading and saving, search and
replace, a completion system, printing, displaying line numbers, and
other features typical of a source code editor.

dependent_to.name: libjwt
dependent_to.description: libjwt JSON Web Token C Library

dependent_to.name: usbutils
dependent_to.description:
This is a collection of USB tools for use on Linux and BSD systems to
query what type of USB devices are connected to the system.

dependent_to.name: libpam
dependent_to.description:
Example PAM module demonstrating two-factor authentication for logging
into servers via SSH, OpenVPN, etc

dependent_to.name: thepeg
dependent_to.description: Toolkit for High Energy Physics Event Generation

dependent_to.name: rivet
dependent_to.description: Rivet - the particle-physics MC analysis toolkit

dependent_to.name: libtool
dependent_to.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependent_to.name: isc-dhcp
dependent_to.description:
ISC DHCP offers a complete open source solution for implementing DHCP
servers, relay agents, and clients. ISC DHCP supports both IPv4 and
IPv6, and is suitable for use in high-volume and high-reliability
applications.

dependent_to.name: librelp
dependent_to.description:
Librelp is an easy to use library for the RELP protocol. RELP (stands
for Reliable Event Logging Protocol) is a general-purpose, extensible
logging protocol.

dependent_to.name: apachetop
dependent_to.description:
ApacheTop watches a logfile generated by Apache (in standard common or
combined logformat, and generates human-parsable output in realtime.)
See the INSTALL file for ./configure options (there's a few newly added
since v0.11)

dependent_to.name: ply
dependent_to.description:
A light-weight dynamic tracer for Linux that leverages the kernel's BPF
VM in concert with kprobes and tracepoints to attach probes to arbitrary
points in the kernel.

dependent_to.name: rpm
dependent_to.description:
The RPM package manager https://github.com/rpm-software-
management/rpm/blob/master/INSTALL Note that debugedit is an additional
tool that *should* compile with adding libdw and elfutils, but the
library (as of 4.16.1.2) is being removed from rpm and will be put
somewhere else.

dependent_to.name: libwebp
dependent_to.description:
WebP is a modern image format that provides superior lossless and lossy
compression for images on the web. Using WebP, webmasters and web
developers can create smaller, richer images that make the web faster.

dependent_to.name: libbson
dependent_to.description:
libbson is a library providing useful routines related to building,
parsing, and iterating BSON documents.

dependent_to.name: vbfnlo
dependent_to.description:
VBFNLO is a fully flexible parton level Monte Carlo program for the
simulation of vector boson fusion, double and triple vector boson
production in hadronic collisions at next to leading order in the strong
coupling constant.

dependent_to.name: libconfuse
dependent_to.description: Small configuration file parser library for C.

dependent_to.name: idba
dependent_to.description:
IDBA is a practical iterative De Bruijn Graph De Novo Assembler for
sequence assembly in bioinfomatics.

dependent_to.name: adol-c
dependent_to.description:
A package for the automatic differentiation of first and higher
derivatives of vector functions in C and C++ programs by operator
overloading.

dependent_to.name: chill
dependent_to.description: A polyheadral compiler for autotuning

dependent_to.name: gpi-2
dependent_to.description:
GPI-2 is an API for the development of scalable, asynchronous and fault
tolerant parallel applications. It implements the GASPI specification
(www.gaspi.de)

dependent_to.name: giflib
dependent_to.description:
The GIFLIB project maintains the giflib service library, which has been
pulling images out of GIFs since 1989.

dependent_to.name: libiscsi
dependent_to.description:
Libiscsi is a client-side library to implement the iSCSI protocol that
can be used to access the resources of an iSCSI target.

dependent_to.name: rempi
dependent_to.description: ReMPI is a record-and-replay tool for MPI applications.

dependent_to.name: zabbix
dependent_to.description:
Real-time monitoring of IT components and services, such as networks,
servers, VMs, applications and the cloud.

dependent_to.name: xpmem
dependent_to.description:
XPMEM is a Linux kernel module that enables a process to map the memory
of another process into its virtual address space.

dependent_to.name: libnetfilter-cttimeout
dependent_to.description: Conntrack timeout policy library.

dependent_to.name: json-cwx
dependent_to.description: JSON-C with Extensions

dependent_to.name: varnish-cache
dependent_to.description: This is Varnish Cache, the high-performance HTTP accelerator.

dependent_to.name: acl
dependent_to.description: Commands for Manipulating POSIX Access Control Lists.

dependent_to.name: ltp
dependent_to.description:
Ltp is a joint project started by SGI, developed and maintained by IBM,
Cisco, Fujitsu, SUSE, Red Hat and others, that has a goal to deliver
test suites to the open source community that validate the reliability,
robustness,and stability of Linux. The LTP testsuite contains a
collection of tools for testing the Linux kernel and related features.

dependent_to.name: squashfs
dependent_to.description: Squashfs - read only compressed filesystem

dependent_to.name: mesa18
dependent_to.description:
Mesa is an open-source implementation of the OpenGL specification - a
system for rendering interactive 3D graphics.

dependent_to.name: libkcapi
dependent_to.description: libkcapi allows user-space to access the Linux kernel crypto API.

dependent_to.name: audacious
dependent_to.description: A lightweight and versatile audio player.

dependent_to.name: ctpl
dependent_to.description:
CTPL is a template engine library written in C and distributed under the
terms of the GNU GPL.

dependent_to.name: verrou
dependent_to.description:
A floating-point error checker. Verrou helps you look for floating-point
round-off errors in programs. It implements a stochastic floating-point
arithmetic based on random rounding: all floating-point operations are
perturbed by randomly switching rounding modes. This can be seen as an
asynchronous variant of the CESTAC method, or a subset of Monte Carlo
Arithmetic, performing only output randomization through random
rounding.

dependent_to.name: libimobiledevice
dependent_to.description: Library to communicate with iOS devices natively.

dependent_to.name: debugedit
dependent_to.description:
Debugedit is a set of libraries and programs for creating and editing
debuginfo. It allows you to get build-ids and rewrite DWARF source
paths. Debugedit was originally part of the rpm project, and now exists
as its own separate project and is maintained by RedHat.

dependent_to.name: libnrm
dependent_to.description:
Libnrm, the application instrumentation library for the Node Resource
Manager(NRM).

dependent_to.name: libusb
dependent_to.description: Library for USB device access.

dependent_to.name: pinfo
dependent_to.description: Pinfo is user-friendly, console-based viewer for Info documents.

dependent_to.name: boinc-client
dependent_to.description:
BOINC is a platform for high-throughput computing on a large scale
(thousands or millions of computers). It can be used for volunteer
computing (using consumer devices) or grid computing (using
organizational resources). It supports virtualized, parallel, and GPU-
based applications.

dependent_to.name: cyrus-sasl
dependent_to.description:
This is the Cyrus SASL API implementation. It can be used on the client
or server side to provide authentication and authorization services.

dependent_to.name: httpd
dependent_to.description:
The Apache HTTP Server is a powerful and flexible HTTP/1.1 compliant web
server.

dependent_to.name: liblbfgs
dependent_to.description:
libLBFGS is a C port of the implementation of Limited-memory Broyden-
Fletcher-Goldfarb-Shanno (L-BFGS) method written by Jorge Nocedal. The
L-BFGS method solves the unconstrainted minimization problem: minimize
F(x), x = (x1, x2, ..., xN), only if the objective function F(x) and its
gradient G(x) are computable.

dependent_to.name: libmbim
dependent_to.description:
Libmbim is a glib-based library for talking to WWAN modems and devices
which speak the Mobile Interface Broadband Model (MBIM) protocol.

dependent_to.name: libdap4
dependent_to.description:
libdap4 is is a c++ library to serve as a client for the OPeNDAP
framework that simplifies all aspects of scientific data networking and
provides software which makes local data accessible to remote locations
regardless of local storage format.

dependent_to.name: mpfi
dependent_to.description: Library for arbitrary precision interval arithmetic based on MPFR

dependent_to.name: libseccomp
dependent_to.description: The main libseccomp repository

dependent_to.name: libjpeg-turbo
dependent_to.description:
libjpeg-turbo is a fork of the original IJG libjpeg which uses SIMD to
accelerate baseline JPEG compression and decompression. libjpeg is a
library that implements JPEG image encoding, decoding and transcoding.

dependent_to.name: netcdf-cxx4
dependent_to.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the C++ distribution.

dependent_to.name: libyaml
dependent_to.description: A C library for parsing and emitting YAML.

dependent_to.name: gasnet
dependent_to.description:
GASNet is a language-independent, networking middleware layer that
provides network-independent, high-performance communication primitives
including Remote Memory Access (RMA) and Active Messages (AM). It has
been used to implement parallel programming models and libraries such as
UPC, UPC++, Co-Array Fortran, Legion, Chapel, and many others. The
interface is primarily intended as a compilation target and for use by
runtime library writers (as opposed to end users), and the primary goals
are high performance, interface portability, and expressiveness.
***NOTICE***: The GASNet library built by this Spack package is ONLY
intended for unit-testing purposes, and is generally UNSUITABLE FOR
PRODUCTION USE. The RECOMMENDED way to build GASNet is as an embedded
library as configured by the higher-level client runtime package (UPC++,
Legion, etc), including system-specific configuration.

dependent_to.name: libnetfilter-cthelper
dependent_to.description: Libnetfilter-cthelper library for user space helpers / ALGs

dependent_to.name: libbeagle
dependent_to.description:
Beagle performs genotype calling, genotype phasing, imputation of
ungenotyped markers, and identity-by-descent segment detection.

dependent_to.name: xcb-util-xrm
dependent_to.description:
XCB util-xrm module provides the 'xrm' library, i.e. utility functions
for the X resource manager.

dependent_to.name: libsamplerate
dependent_to.description:
libsamplerate (also known as Secret Rabbit Code) is a library for
performing sample rate conversion of audio data.

dependent_to.name: nauty
dependent_to.description:
nauty and Traces are programs for computing automorphism groups of
graphsq and digraphs

dependent_to.name: knem
dependent_to.description:
KNEM is a Linux kernel module enabling high-performance intra-node MPI
communication for large messages.

dependent_to.name: libgd
dependent_to.description:
GD is an open source code library for the dynamic creation of images by
programmers. GD is written in C, and "wrappers" are available for Perl,
PHP and other languages. GD creates PNG, JPEG, GIF, WebP, XPM, BMP
images, among other formats. GD is commonly used to generate charts,
graphics, thumbnails, and most anything else, on the fly. While not
restricted to use on the web, the most common applications of GD involve
website development.

dependent_to.name: libverto
dependent_to.description:
libverto provides a loop-neutral async api which allows the library to
expose asynchronous interfaces and offload the choice of the main loop
to the application.

dependent_to.name: virtuoso
dependent_to.description:
Virtuoso is a high-performance and scalable Multi-Model RDBMS, Data
Integration Middleware, Linked Data Deployment, and HTTP Application
Server Platform

dependent_to.name: graphviz
dependent_to.description: Graph Visualization Software

dependent_to.name: vsearch
dependent_to.description: VSEARCH is a versatile open-source tool for metagenomics.

dependent_to.name: extrae
dependent_to.description:
Extrae is the package devoted to generate tracefiles which can be
analyzed later by Paraver. Extrae is a tool that uses different
interposition mechanisms to inject probes into the target application so
as to gather information regarding the application performance. The
Extrae instrumentation package can instrument the MPI programin model,
and the following parallel programming models either alone or in
conjunction with MPI : OpenMP, CUDA, OpenCL, pthread, OmpSs

dependent_to.name: advancecomp
dependent_to.description:
AdvanceCOMP contains recompression utilities for your .zip archives,
.png images, .mng video clips and .gz files.

dependent_to.name: charliecloud
dependent_to.description: Lightweight user-defined software stacks for HPC.

dependent_to.name: xfsdump
dependent_to.description: XFS Dump Tools.

dependent_to.name: numactl
dependent_to.description: NUMA support for Linux

dependent_to.name: bash-completion
dependent_to.description: Programmable completion functions for bash.

dependent_to.name: libestr
dependent_to.description: C library for string handling (and a bit more).

dependent_to.name: hwloc
dependent_to.description:
The Hardware Locality (hwloc) software project. The Portable Hardware
Locality (hwloc) software package provides a portable abstraction
(across OS, versions, architectures, ...) of the hierarchical topology
of modern architectures, including NUMA memory nodes, sockets, shared
caches, cores and simultaneous multithreading. It also gathers various
system attributes such as cache and memory information as well as the
locality of I/O devices such as network interfaces, InfiniBand HCAs or
GPUs. It primarily aims at helping applications with gathering
information about modern computing hardware so as to exploit it
accordingly and efficiently.

dependent_to.name: hpx5
dependent_to.description:
The HPX-5 Runtime System. HPX-5 (High Performance ParalleX) is an open
source, portable, performance-oriented runtime developed at CREST
(Indiana University). HPX-5 provides a distributed programming model
allowing programs to run unmodified on systems from a single SMP to
large clusters and supercomputers with thousands of nodes. HPX-5
supports a wide variety of Intel and ARM platforms. It is being used by
a broad range of scientific applications enabling scientists to write
code that performs and scales better than contemporary runtimes.

dependent_to.name: dimemas
dependent_to.description: High-abstracted network simulator for message-passing programs.

dependent_to.name: codes
dependent_to.description: CO-Design of multi-layer Exascale Storage (CODES) simulation framework

dependent_to.name: swig
dependent_to.description:
SWIG is an interface compiler that connects programs written in C and
C++ with scripting languages such as Perl, Python, Ruby, and Tcl. It
works by taking the declarations found in C/C++ header files and using
them to generate the wrapper code that scripting languages need to
access the underlying C/C++ code. In addition, SWIG provides a variety
of customization features that let you tailor the wrapping process to
suit your application.

dependent_to.name: gridlab-d
dependent_to.description:
Autotools package for Gridlab-D, a new power distribution system
simulation and analysis tool that provides valuable information to users
who design and operate distribution systems, and to utilities that wish
to take advantage of the latest energy technologies. Gridlab-D is a
flexible simulation environment that can be integrated with a variety of
third-party data management and analysis tools.

dependent_to.name: bolt
dependent_to.description:
BOLT targets a high-performing OpenMP implementation, especially
specialized for fine-grain parallelism. Unlike other OpenMP
implementations, BOLT utilizes a lightweight threading model for its
underlying threading mechanism. It currently adopts Argobots, a new
holistic, low-level threading and tasking runtime, in order to overcome
shortcomings of conventional OS-level threads. The current BOLT
implementation is based on the OpenMP runtime in LLVM, and thus it can
be used with LLVM/Clang, Intel OpenMP compiler, and GCC.

dependent_to.name: axel
dependent_to.description: Axel is a light command line download accelerator for Linux and Unix

dependent_to.name: gsl
dependent_to.description:
The GNU Scientific Library (GSL) is a numerical library for C and C++
programmers. It is free software under the GNU General Public License.
The library provides a wide range of mathematical routines such as
random number generators, special functions and least-squares fitting.
There are over 1000 functions in total with an extensive test suite.

dependent_to.name: rinetd
dependent_to.description:
This program is used to efficiently redirect connections from one IP
address/port combination to another.

dependent_to.name: acpid
dependent_to.description:
ACPID used to try to handle events internally. Rather than try to climb
an ever-growing mountain, ACPID now lets YOU define what events to
handle. Any event that publishes itself to /proc/acpi/event can be
handled. ACPID reads a set of configuration files which define
event->action pairs. This is how you make it do stuff. See the man page
for details.

dependent_to.name: opentsdb
dependent_to.description:
OpenTSDB is a distributed, scalable Time Series Database (TSDB) written
on top of HBase. OpenTSDB was written to address a common need: store,
index and serve metrics collected from computer systems (network gear,
operating systems, applications) at a large scale, and make this data
easily accessible and graphable.

dependent_to.name: charmpp
dependent_to.description:
Charm++ is a parallel programming framework in C++ supported by an
adaptive runtime system, which enhances user productivity and allows
programs to run portably from small multicore computers (your laptop) to
the largest supercomputers.

dependent_to.name: libpaper
dependent_to.description:
The paper library and accompanying files are intended to provide a
simple way for applications to take actions based on a system- or user-
specified paper size.

dependent_to.name: p4est
dependent_to.description:
Dynamic management of a collection (a forest) of adaptive octrees in
parallel

dependent_to.name: geoip-api-c
dependent_to.description:
The GeoIP Legacy C library enables the user to find geographical and
network information of an IP address.

dependent_to.name: i3
dependent_to.description:
i3, improved tiling wm. i3 is a tiling window manager, completely
written from scratch. The target platforms are GNU/Linux and BSD
operating systems, our code is Free and Open Source Software (FOSS)
under the BSD license. i3 is primarily targeted at advanced users and
developers.

dependent_to.name: mpich
dependent_to.description:
MPICH is a high performance and widely portable implementation of the
Message Passing Interface (MPI) standard.

dependent_to.name: iegenlib
dependent_to.description:
Inspector/Executor Generation Library for manipulating sets and
relations with uninterpreted function symbols.

dependent_to.name: libfastjson
dependent_to.description: a fast json library for C.

dependent_to.name: wayland-protocols
dependent_to.description:
wayland-protocols contains Wayland protocols that add functionality not
available in the Wayland core protocol. Such protocols either add
completely new functionality, or extend the functionality of some other
protocol either in Wayland core, or some other protocol i n wayland-
protocols.

dependent_to.name: diffmark
dependent_to.description: Diffmark is a DSL for transforming one string to another.

dependent_to.name: mdsplus
dependent_to.description:
A set of software tools for data acquisition and storage and a
methodology for management of complex scientific data.

dependent_to.name: libusbmuxd
dependent_to.description: A client library to multiplex connections from and to iOS devices.

dependent_to.name: libnfsidmap
dependent_to.description: Library to help mapping id's, mainly for NFSv4.

dependent_to.name: gnome-common
dependent_to.description:
Module containing various files needed to bootstrap GNOME modules built
from git.

dependent_to.name: flux-sched
dependent_to.description: A scheduler for flux-core (pre-alpha)

dependent_to.name: prrte
dependent_to.description:
PRRTE is the Reference RunTime Environment implementation for PMIx. It
is capable of operating within a host SMS. The reference RTE therefore
provides an easy way of exploring PMIx capabilities and testing PMIx-
based applications outside of a PMIx-enabled environment.

dependent_to.name: 3proxy
dependent_to.description: 3proxy - tiny free proxy server

dependent_to.name: povray
dependent_to.description:
The Persistence of Vision Raytracer creates three-dimensional, photo-
realistic images using a rendering technique called ray-tracing. It
reads in a text file containing information describing the objects and
lighting in a scene and generates an image of that scene from the view
point of a camera also described in the text file. Ray-tracing is not a
fast process by any means, but it produces very high quality images with
realistic reflections, shading, perspective and other effects.

dependent_to.name: recorder
dependent_to.description:
A multi-level library for understanding I/O activity in HPC
applications.

dependent_to.name: qperf
dependent_to.description:
The qperf measures bandwidth and latency between two nodes. It can work
over TCP/IP as well as the RDMA transports.

dependent_to.name: ganglia
dependent_to.description:
Ganglia is a scalable distributed monitoring system for high-performance
computing systems such as clusters and Grids. It is based on a
hierarchical design targeted at federations of clusters. Supports
clusters up to 2000 nodes in size.

dependent_to.name: fuse-overlayfs
dependent_to.description: An implementation of overlay+shiftfs in FUSE for rootless containers.

dependent_to.name: flint
dependent_to.description: FLINT (Fast Library for Number Theory).

dependent_to.name: darshan-runtime
dependent_to.description:
Darshan (runtime) is a scalable HPC I/O characterization tool designed
to capture an accurate picture of application I/O behavior, including
properties such as patterns of access within files, with minimum
overhead. DarshanRuntime package should be installed on systems where
you intend to instrument MPI applications.

dependent_to.name: libev
dependent_to.description:
A full-featured and high-performance event loop that is loosely modelled
after libevent, but without its limitations and bugs.

dependent_to.name: libcap-ng
dependent_to.description: Libcap-ng is a library that makes using posix capabilities easier

dependent_to.name: libevdev
dependent_to.description:
libevdev is a wrapper library for evdev devices. it moves the common
tasks when dealing with evdev devices into a library and provides a
library interface to the callers, thus avoiding erroneous ioctls, etc.

dependent_to.name: motif
dependent_to.description:
" Motif - Graphical user interface (GUI) specification and the widget
toolkit

dependent_to.name: libcgroup
dependent_to.description: Library of control groups.

dependent_to.name: libao
dependent_to.description: A Cross-platform Audio Library.

dependent_to.name: aml
dependent_to.description: AML: Building Blocks for Memory Management.

dependent_to.name: brltty
dependent_to.description:
BRLTTY is a background process (daemon) providing access to the
Linux/Unix console (when in text mode) for a blind person using a
refreshable braille display.

dependent_to.name: json-c
dependent_to.description: A JSON implementation in C.

dependent_to.name: mpfr
dependent_to.description:
The MPFR library is a C library for multiple-precision floating-point
computations with correct rounding.

dependent_to.name: asio
dependent_to.description: C++ library for network and low-level I/O programming.

dependent_to.name: filebench
dependent_to.description:
Filebench is a file system and storage benchmark that can generate a
large variety of workloads. Unlike typical benchmarks it is extremely
flexible and allows to specify application's I/O behavior using its
extensive Workload Model Language (WML). Users can either describe
desired workloads from scratch or use(with or without modifications)
workload personalities shipped with Filebench(e.g., mail-, web-, file-,
and database-server workloads). Filebench is equally good for micro and
macro-benchmarking, quick to setup, and relatively easy to use.

dependent_to.name: xclip
dependent_to.description:
xclip is a command line utility that is designed to run on any system
with an X11 implementation. It provides an interface to X selections
("the clipboard") from the command line. It can read data from standard
in or a file and place it in an X selection for pasting into other X
applications. xclip can also print an X selection to standard out, which
can then be redirected to a file or another program.

dependent_to.name: libqrencode
dependent_to.description: libqrencode - a fast and compact QR Code encoding library.

dependent_to.name: tophat
dependent_to.description: Spliced read mapper for RNA-Seq.

dependent_to.name: userspace-rcu
dependent_to.description:
liburcu is a LGPLv2.1 userspace RCU (read-copy-update) library. This
data synchronization library provides read-side access which scales
linearly with the number of cores.

dependent_to.name: mount-point-attributes
dependent_to.description:
Library to turn expensive, non-scalable file system calls into simple
string comparison operations.

dependent_to.name: openslp
dependent_to.description:
OpenSLP project is an effort to develop an open-source, commercial-
grade, implementation of IETF Standards track Service Location Protocol
(RFC 2608). The interface conforms to IETF Standards track, "An API for
Service Location" (RFC 2614)

dependent_to.name: wayland
dependent_to.description:
Wayland is a project to define a protocol for a compositor to talk to
its clients as well as a library implementation of the protocol. The
compositor can be a standalone display server running on Linux kernel
modesetting and evdev input devices, an X application, or a wayland
client itself. The clients can be traditional applications, X
servers(rootless or fullscreen) or other display servers.

dependent_to.name: libunwind
dependent_to.description:
A portable and efficient C programming interface (API) to determine the
call-chain of a program.

dependent_to.name: qd
dependent_to.description:
C++/Fortran-90 double-double and quad-double package. With modifications
for easier integration with NJet. see http://crd-
legacy.lbl.gov/~dhbailey/mpdist/ for authors page

dependent_to.name: erlang
dependent_to.description:
Erlang is a programming language and runtime system for building
massively scalable soft real-time systems with requirements on high
availability.

dependent_to.name: enca
dependent_to.description: Extremely Naive Charset Analyser.

dependent_to.name: libtar
dependent_to.description: libtar is a library for manipulating tar files from within C programs.

dependent_to.name: libpeas
dependent_to.description:
libpeas is a gobject-based plugins engine, and is targeted at giving
every application the chance to assume its own extensibility.

dependent_to.name: libharu
dependent_to.description:
libharu - free PDF library. Haru is a free, cross platform, open-sourced
software library for generating PDF.

dependent_to.name: bird
dependent_to.description:
The BIRD project aims to develop a dynamic IP routing daemon with full
support of all modern routing protocols, easy to use configuration
interface and powerful route filtering language, primarily targeted on
(but not limited to) Linux and other UNIX-like systems and distributed
under the GNU General Public License.

dependent_to.name: squashfuse
dependent_to.description: squashfuse - Mount SquashFS archives using FUSE

dependent_to.name: kbd
dependent_to.description:
The kbd project contains tools for managing Linux console (Linux
console, virtual terminals, keyboard, etc.) - mainly, what they do is
loading console fonts and keyboard maps.

dependent_to.name: libmetalink
dependent_to.description:
Libmetalink is a library to read Metalink XML download description
format. It supports both Metalink version 3 and Metalink version 4 (RFC
5854).

dependent_to.name: ocl-icd
dependent_to.description:
This package aims at creating an Open Source alternative to vendor
specific OpenCL ICD loaders.

dependent_to.name: xdelta
dependent_to.description:
Xdelta version 3 is a C library and command-line tool for delta
compression using VCDIFF/RFC 3284 streams.

dependent_to.name: singularity-legacy
dependent_to.description:
Singularity is a container platform focused on supporting 'Mobility of
Compute'. The software changed the installation method from AutoTools to
GoLang, so we have two separate package names to support that. The
legacy package is pre-version 3.0.0

dependent_to.name: fullock
dependent_to.description:
FULLOCK is a lock library provided by Yahoo! JAPAN, that is very fast
and runs on user level.This library provides two lock type.

dependent_to.name: memkind
dependent_to.description:
The memkind library is a user extensible heap manager built on top of
jemalloc which enables control of memory characteristics and a
partitioning of the heap between kinds of memory. The kinds of memory
are defined by operating system memory policies that have been applied
to virtual address ranges. Memory characteristics supported by memkind
without user extension include control of NUMA and page size features.
The jemalloc non-standard interface has been extended to enable
specialized arenas to make requests for virtual memory from the
operating system through the memkind partition interface. Through the
other memkind interfaces the user can control and extend memory
partition features and allocate memory while selecting enabled features.

dependent_to.name: form
dependent_to.description: FORM is a Symbolic Manipulation System.

dependent_to.name: man-db
dependent_to.description:
man-db is an implementation of the standard Unix documentation system
accessed using the man command. It uses a Berkeley DB database in place
of the traditional flat-text whatis databases.

dependent_to.name: memcached
dependent_to.description:
Memcached is a high performance multithreaded event-based key/value
cache store intended to be used in a distributed system.

dependent_to.name: audit-userspace
dependent_to.description: Linux audit userspace

dependent_to.name: libnova
dependent_to.description:
"libnova is a general purpose, double precision, Celestial Mechanics,
Astrometry and Astrodynamics library.

dependent_to.name: breseq
dependent_to.description:
breseq is a computational pipeline for finding mutations relative to a
reference sequence in short-read DNA re-sequencing data for haploid
microbial-sized genomes.

dependent_to.name: silo
dependent_to.description:
Silo is a library for reading and writing a wide variety of scientific
data to binary, disk files.

dependent_to.name: nix
dependent_to.description: Nix, the purely functional package manager

dependent_to.name: libmacaroons
dependent_to.description:
"This library provides an implementation of macaroons[1], which are
flexible authorization tokens that work great in distributed systems.

dependent_to.name: plumed
dependent_to.description:
PLUMED is an open source library for free energy calculations in
molecular systems which works together with some of the most popular
molecular dynamics engines. Free energy calculations can be performed as
a function of many order parameters with a particular focus on
biological problems, using state of the art methods such as
metadynamics, umbrella sampling and Jarzynski-equation based steered MD.
The software, written in C++, can be easily interfaced with both fortran
and C/C++ codes.

dependent_to.name: libhbaapi
dependent_to.description: The SNIA HBA API library

dependent_to.name: liblognorm
dependent_to.description: Liblognorm is a fast-samples based normalization library.

dependent_to.name: ior
dependent_to.description:
The IOR software is used for benchmarking parallel file systems using
POSIX, MPI-IO, or HDF5 interfaces.

dependent_to.name: gengeo
dependent_to.description:
GenGeo is a library of tools for creating complex particle geometries
for use in ESyS-Particle simulations. GenGeo is a standalone application
with a Python API that creates geometry files suitable for importing
into ESyS-Particle simulations. The functionality of GenGeo far exceeds
the in-simulation geometry creation utilities provided by ESyS-Particle
itself.

dependent_to.name: icarus
dependent_to.description: Icarus Verilog is a Verilog simulation and synthesis tool.

dependent_to.name: font-util
dependent_to.description: X.Org font package creation/installation utilities and fonts.

dependent_to.name: valgrind
dependent_to.description:
An instrumentation framework for building dynamic analysis. There are
Valgrind tools that can automatically detect many memory management and
threading bugs, and profile your programs in detail. You can also use
Valgrind to build new tools. Valgrind is Open Source / Free Software,
and is freely available under the GNU General Public License, version 2.

dependent_to.name: watch
dependent_to.description: Executes a program periodically, showing output fullscreen.

dependent_to.name: geopm
dependent_to.description:
GEOPM is an extensible power management framework targeting HPC. The
GEOPM package provides libgeopm, libgeopmpolicy and applications
geopmctl and geopmpolicy, as well as tools for postprocessing. GEOPM is
designed to be extended for new control algorithms and new hardware
power management features via its plugin infrastructure. Note: GEOPM
interfaces with hardware using Model Specific Registers (MSRs). For
propper usage make sure MSRs are made available directly or via the msr-
safe kernel module by your administrator.

dependent_to.name: editline
dependent_to.description: A readline() replacement for UNIX without termcap (ncurses)

dependent_to.name: libxcrypt
dependent_to.description: libxcrypt is a modern library for one-way hashing of passwords.

dependent_to.name: unifyfs
dependent_to.description:
User level file system that enables applications to use node-local
storage as burst buffers for shared files. Supports scalable and
efficient aggregation of I/O bandwidth from burst buffers while having
the same life cycle as a batch-submitted job. UnifyFS is designed to
support common I/O workloads, including checkpoint/restart. While
primarily designed for N-N write/read, UnifyFS compliments its
functionality with the support for N-1 write/read.

dependent_to.name: p11-kit
dependent_to.description:
p11-kit aims to solve problems with coordinating the use of PKCS #11 by
different components or libraries living in the same process, by
providing a way to load and enumerate PKCS #11 modules, as well as a
standard configuration setup for installing PKCS #11 modules in such a
way that they're discoverable.

dependent_to.name: ethtool
dependent_to.description:
Ethtool is a small utility for examining and tuning your ethernet-based
network interface.

dependent_to.name: php
dependent_to.description:
PHP is a popular general-purpose scripting language that is especially
suited to web development. Fast, flexible and pragmatic, PHP powers
everything from your blog to the most popular websites in the world.

dependent_to.name: gource
dependent_to.description: Software version control visualization.

dependent_to.name: parallel-netcdf
dependent_to.description:
PnetCDF (Parallel netCDF) is a high-performance parallel I/O library for
accessing files in format compatibility with Unidata's NetCDF,
specifically the formats of CDF-1, 2, and 5.

dependent_to.name: glusterfs
dependent_to.description:
Gluster is a software defined distributed storage that can scale to
several petabytes. It provides interfaces for object, block and file
storage.

dependent_to.name: expect
dependent_to.description:
Expect is a tool for automating interactive applications such as telnet,
ftp, passwd, fsck, rlogin, tip, etc.

dependent_to.name: stc
dependent_to.description: STC: The Swift-Turbine Compiler

dependent_to.name: libnet
dependent_to.description:
Libnet is an API to help with the construction and handling of network
packets. It provides a portable framework for low-level network packet
writing and handling

dependent_to.name: yara
dependent_to.description:
YARA is a tool aimed at (but not limited to) helping malware researchers
to identify and classify malware samples

dependent_to.name: atf
dependent_to.description:
ATF, or Automated Testing Framework, is a collection of libraries to
write test programs in C, C++ and POSIX shell.

dependent_to.name: lhapdf
dependent_to.description:
LHAPDF is a general purpose C++ interpolator, used for evaluating PDFs
from discretised data files.

dependent_to.name: saga-gis
dependent_to.description:
SAGA is a GIS for Automated Geoscientific Analyses and has been
designed for an easy and effective implementation of spatial algorithms.
It offers a comprehensive, growing set of geoscientific methods and
provides an easily approachable user interface with many visualisation
options

dependent_to.name: sshpass
dependent_to.description:
Sshpass is a tool for non-interactivly performing password
authentication with SSH's so called "interactive keyboard password
authentication". Most user should use SSH's more secure public key
authentiaction instead.

dependent_to.name: dropwatch
dependent_to.description:
Dropwatch is a project I started in an effort to improve the ability for
developers and system administrator to diagnose problems in the Linux
Networking stack, specifically in our ability to diagnose where packets
are getting dropped.

dependent_to.name: trinity
dependent_to.description:
Trinity, developed at the Broad Institute and the Hebrew University of
Jerusalem, represents a novel method for the efficient and robust de
novo reconstruction of transcriptomes from RNA-seq data. Trinity
combines three independent software modules: Inchworm, Chrysalis, and
Butterfly, applied sequentially to process large volumes of RNA-seq
reads. Trinity partitions the sequence data into many individual de
Bruijn graphs, each representing the transcriptional complexity at a
given gene or locus, and then processes each graph independently to
extract full-length splicing isoforms and to tease apart transcripts
derived from paralogous genes.

dependent_to.name: ds
dependent_to.description:
SAOImage DS9 is an astronomical imaging and data visualization
application.

dependent_to.name: mesa-demos
dependent_to.description: This package provides some demo applications for testing Mesa.

dependent_to.name: libnfnetlink
dependent_to.description:
libnfnetlink is a userspace library that provides some low-level
nfnetlink handling functions. It is used as a foundation for other,
netfilter subsystem specific libraries such as libnfnetlink_conntrack,
libnfnetlink_log and libnfnetlink_queue.

dependent_to.name: libconfig
dependent_to.description: C/C++ Configuration File Library

dependent_to.name: openmpi
dependent_to.description:
An open source Message Passing Interface implementation. The Open MPI
Project is an open source Message Passing Interface implementation that
is developed and maintained by a consortium of academic, research, and
industry partners. Open MPI is therefore able to combine the expertise,
technologies, and resources from all across the High Performance
Computing community in order to build the best MPI library available.
Open MPI offers advantages for system and software vendors, application
developers and computer science researchers.

dependent_to.name: libndp
dependent_to.description: Libndp - Library for Neighbor Discovery Protocol

dependent_to.name: fftw
dependent_to.description:
FFTW is a C subroutine library for computing the discrete Fourier
transform (DFT) in one or more dimensions, of arbitrary input size, and
of both real and complex data (as well as of even/odd data, i.e. the
discrete cosine/sine transforms or DCT/DST). We believe that FFTW, which
is free software, should become the FFT library of choice for most
applications.

dependent_to.name: sos
dependent_to.description: Sandia OpenSHMEM.

dependent_to.name: pandaseq
dependent_to.description:
PANDASEQ is a program to align Illumina reads, optionally with PCR
primers embedded in the sequence, and reconstruct an overlapping
sequence.

dependent_to.name: httperf
dependent_to.description:
Httperf is a tool for measuring web server performance. It provides a
flexible facility for generating various HTTP workloads and for
measuring server performance.

dependent_to.name: turbine
dependent_to.description: Turbine: The Swift/T runtime

dependent_to.name: libint
dependent_to.description:
Libint is a high-performance library for computing Gaussian integrals in
quantum mechanics.

dependent_to.name: htslib
dependent_to.description: C library for high-throughput sequencing data formats.

dependent_to.name: workrave
dependent_to.description:
Workrave is a program that assists in the recovery and prevention of
Repetitive Strain Injury (RSI). The program frequently alerts you to
take micro-pauses, rest breaks and restricts you to your daily limit.
The program runs on GNU/Linux and Microsoft Windows.

dependent_to.name: libmad
dependent_to.description: MAD is a high-quality MPEG audio decoder.

dependent_to.name: authselect
dependent_to.description: Select authentication and indentity profile to use on the system.

dependent_to.name: cairo
dependent_to.description: Cairo is a 2D graphics library with support for multiple output devices.

dependent_to.name: libfabric
dependent_to.description:
The Open Fabrics Interfaces (OFI) is a framework focused on exporting
fabric communication services to applications.

dependent_to.name: fribidi
dependent_to.description:
GNU FriBidi: The Free Implementation of the Unicode Bidirectional
Algorithm.

dependent_to.name: czmq
dependent_to.description: A C interface to the ZMQ library

dependent_to.name: libtheora
dependent_to.description: Theora Video Compression.

dependent_to.name: bubblewrap
dependent_to.description: Unprivileged sandboxing tool

dependent_to.name: protobuf
dependent_to.description: Google's data interchange format.

dependent_to.name: fipscheck
dependent_to.description:
The integrity check is only one of many requirements needed for
validation of a software cryptographic module.

dependent_to.name: hybrid-lambda
dependent_to.description:
Hybrid-Lambda is a software package that can simulate gene trees within
a rooted species network or a rooted species tree under the coalescent
process. The main feature of this program is that users can choose to
use the standard Kingman coalescent process, which produces bifurcating
genealogies, or two other Lambda coalescent processes, which produce
multifurcating genealogies. The other feature is that hybrid sim uses
extended Newick formatted strings to make it easier to represent
hybridization events between species.

dependent_to.name: cryptsetup
dependent_to.description: Cryptsetup and LUKS - open-source disk encryption.

dependent_to.name: netcdf-c
dependent_to.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the C distribution.

dependent_to.name: libnetfilter-conntrack
dependent_to.description:
libnetfilter_conntrack is a userspace library providing a programming
interface (API) to the in-kernel connection tracking state table.

dependent_to.name: rng-tools
dependent_to.description:
This is a random number generator daemon. It monitors a set of entropy
sources, and supplies entropy from them to the system kernel's
/dev/random machinery.

dependent_to.name: thrift
dependent_to.description:
Software framework for scalable cross-language services development.
Thrift combines a software stack with a code generation engine to build
services that work efficiently and seamlessly between C++, Java, Python,
PHP, Ruby, Erlang, Perl, Haskell, C#, Cocoa, JavaScript, Node.js,
Smalltalk, OCaml and Delphi and other languages.

dependent_to.name: citcoms
dependent_to.description:
CitcomS is a finite element code designed to solve compressible
thermochemical convection problems relevant to Earth's mantle.

dependent_to.name: nbdkit
dependent_to.description:
NBD(Network Block Device) is a protocol for accessing Block Devices
(hard disks and disk-like things) over a Network. nbdkit is a toolkit
for creating NBD servers.

dependent_to.name: moab
dependent_to.description:
MOAB is a component for representing and evaluating mesh data. MOAB can
store structured and unstructured mesh, consisting of elements in the
finite element 'zoo.' The functional interface to MOAB is simple yet
powerful, allowing the representation of many types of metadata commonly
found on the mesh. MOAB is optimized for efficiency in space and time,
based on access to mesh in chunks rather than through individual
entities, while also versatile enough to support individual entity
access.

dependent_to.name: tpm2-tss
dependent_to.description: OSS implementation of the TCG TPM2 Software Stack (TSS2)

dependent_to.name: dtf
dependent_to.description:
DTF (Data Transfer Framework) is a general I/O arbitration middleware
designed for multi-component applications that use file-base component
coupling. DTF works for applications that use the Parallel netCDF
(PnetCDF) library for file I/O. It allows the user to transparently
replace file I/O with sending the data directly between the components.

dependent_to.name: libbacktrace
dependent_to.description:
A C library that may be linked into a C/C++ program to produce symbolic
backtraces.

dependent_to.name: fgsl
dependent_to.description: Fortran interface to the GNU Scientific Library

dependent_to.name: guacamole-server
dependent_to.description:
The guacamole-server package is a set of software which forms the basis
of the Guacamole stack. It consists of guacd, libguac, and several
protocol support libraries.

dependent_to.name: cmockery
dependent_to.description:
A lightweight library to simplify and generalize the process of writing
unit tests for C applications.

dependent_to.name: hyphen
dependent_to.description: A library of text hyphenation.

dependent_to.name: lksctp-tools
dependent_to.description: A Linux SCTP helper library

dependent_to.name: migrate
dependent_to.description:
Migrate estimates effective population sizes and past migration rates
between n population assuming a migration matrix model with asymmetric
migration rates and different subpopulation sizes

dependent_to.name: sst-dumpi
dependent_to.description:
The DUMPI package provides libraries to collect and read traces of MPI
applications. Traces are created by linking an application with a
library that uses the PMPI interface to intercept MPI calls. DUMPI
records signatures of all MPI-1 and MPI-2 subroutine calls, return
values, request information, and PAPI counters.

dependent_to.name: launchmon
dependent_to.description:
Software infrastructure that enables HPC run-time tools to co-locate
tool daemons with a parallel job.

dependent_to.name: yasm
dependent_to.description:
Yasm is a complete rewrite of the NASM-2.11.06 assembler. It supports
the x86 and AMD64 instruction sets, accepts NASM and GAS assembler
syntaxes and outputs binary, ELF32 and ELF64 object formats.

dependent_to.name: exmcutils
dependent_to.description: ExM C-Utils: Generic C utility library for ADLB/X and Swift/T

dependent_to.name: fastme
dependent_to.description:
FastME is a distance based phylogeny reconstruction program that works
on distance matrices and, as of v2.0, sequence data.

dependent_to.name: sst-elements
dependent_to.description:
SST Elements implements a range of components for performing
architecture simulation from node-level to system-level using the SST
discrete event core

dependent_to.name: dataspaces
dependent_to.description: an extreme scale data management framework.

dependent_to.name: libnsl
dependent_to.description:
This library contains the public client interface for NIS(YP) and NIS+
in a IPv6 ready version.

dependent_to.name: dssp
dependent_to.description: 'mkdssp' utility. (dictionary of protein secondary structure)

dependent_to.name: eq-r
dependent_to.description: EMEWS Queues for R (EQ/R) Installs EQ/R.

dependent_to.name: bmi
dependent_to.description: a communications framework and network abstraction layer

dependent_to.name: athena
dependent_to.description:
Athena is a grid-based code for astrophysical magnetohydrodynamics
(MHD). It was developed primarily for studies of the interstellar
medium, star formation, and accretion flows.

dependent_to.name: arpack-ng
dependent_to.description:
ARPACK-NG is a collection of Fortran77 subroutines designed to solve
large scale eigenvalue problems. Important Features: * Reverse
Communication Interface. * Single and Double Precision Real Arithmetic
Versions for Symmetric, Non-symmetric, Standard or Generalized Problems.
* Single and Double Precision Complex Arithmetic Versions for Standard
or Generalized Problems. * Routines for Banded Matrices - Standard or
Generalized Problems. * Routines for The Singular Value Decomposition. *
Example driver routines that may be used as templates to implement
numerous Shift-Invert strategies for all problem types, data types and
precision. This project is a joint project between Debian, Octave and
Scilab in order to provide a common and maintained version of arpack.
Indeed, no single release has been published by Rice university for the
last few years and since many software (Octave, Scilab, R, Matlab...)
forked it and implemented their own modifications, arpack-ng aims to
tackle this by providing a common repository and maintained versions.
arpack-ng is replacing arpack almost everywhere.

dependent_to.name: openpbs
dependent_to.description:
PBS Professional software optimizes job scheduling and workload
management in high-performance computing (HPC) environments - clusters,
clouds, and supercomputers - improving system efficiency and people's
productivity.

dependent_to.name: biobambam2
dependent_to.description: Tools for early stage alignment file processing

dependent_to.name: hunspell
dependent_to.description: The most popular spellchecking library (sez the author...).

dependent_to.name: git
dependent_to.description:
Git is a free and open source distributed version control system
designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with
speed and efficiency.

dependent_to.name: modylas
dependent_to.description:
The 'MOlecular DYnamics Software for LArge Systems' (MODYLAS) is a
general-purpose, molecular dynamics simulation program suited to the
simulation of very large physical, chemical, and biological systems.

dependent_to.name: libnetfilter-queue
dependent_to.description: Libnetfilter-queue libnetfilter queue library.

dependent_to.name: qucs
dependent_to.description:
QUCS - Quite Universal Circuit Simulator Qucs is an integrated circuit
simulator which means you are able to setup a circuit with a graphical
user interface (GUI) and simulate the large-signal, small-signal and
noise behaviour of the circuit. After that simulation has finished you
can view the simulation results on a presentation page or window.

dependent_to.name: margo
dependent_to.description:
A library that provides Argobots bindings to the Mercury RPC
implementation. This name will be deprecated soon; please use the mochi-
margo package instead.

dependent_to.name: pruners-ninja
dependent_to.description:
NINJA: Noise Inject agent tool to expose subtle and unintended message
races.

dependent_to.name: zoltan
dependent_to.description:
The Zoltan library is a toolkit of parallel combinatorial algorithms for
parallel, unstructured, and/or adaptive scientific applications.
Zoltan's largest component is a suite of dynamic load-balancing and
partitioning algorithms that increase applications' parallel performance
by reducing idle time. Zoltan also has graph coloring and graph ordering
algorithms, which are useful in task schedulers and parallel
preconditioners.

dependent_to.name: linux-pam
dependent_to.description: Linux PAM (Pluggable Authentication Modules for Linux) project.

dependent_to.name: portcullis
dependent_to.description: PORTable CULLing of Invalid Splice junctions

dependent_to.name: otf2
dependent_to.description:
The Open Trace Format 2 is a highly scalable, memory efficient event
trace data format plus support library.

dependent_to.name: fyba
dependent_to.description:
OpenFYBA is the source code release of the FYBA library, distributed by
the National Mapping Authority of Norway (Statens kartverk) to read and
write files in the National geodata standard format SOSI.

dependent_to.name: kmod
dependent_to.description:
kmod is a set of tools to handle common tasks with Linux kernel modules
like insert, remove, list, check properties, resolve dependencies and
aliases.

dependent_to.name: xmlf90
dependent_to.description: xmlf90 is a suite of libraries to handle XML in Fortran.

dependent_to.name: universal-ctags
dependent_to.description:
Universal Ctags generates an index (or tag) file of language objects
found in source files for many popular programming languages. This index
makes it easy for text editors and other tools to locate the indexed
items.

dependent_to.name: weighttp
dependent_to.description: A lightweight and simple webserver benchmarking tool

dependent_to.name: sst-macro
dependent_to.description:
The Structural Simulation Toolkit Macroscale Element Library simulates
large-scale parallel computer architectures for the coarse-grained study
of distributed-memory applications. The simulator is driven from either
a trace file or skeleton application. SST/macro's modular architecture
can be extended with additional network models, trace file formats,
software services, and processor models.

dependent_to.name: sysbench
dependent_to.description: Scriptable database and system performance benchmark.

dependent_to.name: dotconf
dependent_to.description: dot.conf configuration file parser.

dependent_to.name: automake
dependent_to.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependent_to.name: iso-codes
dependent_to.description: ISO-codes provides lists of various ISO standards

dependent_to.name: andi
dependent_to.description:
andi is used for for estimating the evolutionary distance between
closely related genomes.

dependent_to.name: hstr
dependent_to.description:
hstr(hh) is a shell history suggest box for Bash and Zsh, which enables
easy viewing, searching and using your command history.

dependent_to.name: mokutil
dependent_to.description: The utility to manipulate machines owner keys which managed in shim.

dependent_to.name: speexdsp
dependent_to.description: SpeexDSP is a patent-free, Open Source/Free Software DSP library.

dependent_to.name: backupninja
dependent_to.description: Backupninja backup tool.

dependent_to.name: kallisto
dependent_to.description:
kallisto is a program for quantifying abundances of transcripts from
RNA-Seq data.

dependent_to.name: bgpdump
dependent_to.description: Utility and C Library for parsing MRT files

dependent_to.name: argobots
dependent_to.description:
Argobots, which was developed as a part of the Argo project, is a
lightweight runtime system that supports integrated computation and data
movement with massive concurrency. It will directly leverage the lowest-
level constructs in the hardware and OS: lightweight notification
mechanisms, data movement engines, memory mapping, and data placement
strategies. It consists of an execution model and a memory model.

dependent_to.name: fping
dependent_to.description: High performance ping tool.

dependent_to.name: eigenexa
dependent_to.description: EigenExa is a high-performance eigenvalue solver.

dependent_to.name: cgdcbxd
dependent_to.description:
cgdcbxd is a daemon used to monitor DCB netlink events and manage the
net_prio control group subsystem. The daemon keeps the hierarchy and
priority mappings in sync with DCBX Application events

dependent_to.name: rasdaemon
dependent_to.description:
Rasdaemon is a RAS (Reliability, Availability and Serviceability)
logging tool. It records memory errors, using the EDAC tracing events.
EDAC is a Linux kernel subsystem with handles detection of ECC errors
from memory controllers for most chipsets on i386 and x86_64
architectures. EDAC drivers for other architectures like arm also
exists.

dependent_to.name: rsyslog
dependent_to.description: The rocket-fast Syslog Server.

dependent_to.name: libisal
dependent_to.description:
ISA-L is a collection of optimized low-level functions targeting storage
applications.

dependent_to.name: minizip
dependent_to.description: C library for zip/unzip via zLib.

dependent_to.name: flux-core
dependent_to.description: A next-generation resource manager (pre-alpha)

dependent_to.name: libzmq
dependent_to.description: The ZMQ networking/concurrency library and core API

dependent_to.name: dosfstools
dependent_to.description:
dosfstools consists of the programs mkfs.fat, fsck.fat and fatlabel to
create, check and label file systems of the FAT family.

dependent_to.name: herwig3
dependent_to.description: Herwig is a multi-purpose particle physics event generator.

dependent_to.name: powerapi
dependent_to.description: This software is a reference implementation of the PowerAPI

dependent_to.name: sga
dependent_to.description:
SGA is a de novo genome assembler based on the concept of string graphs.
The major goal of SGA is to be very memory efficient, which is achieved
by using a compressed representation of DNA sequence reads.

dependent_to.name: emacs
dependent_to.description: The Emacs programmable text editor.

dependent_to.name: byacc
dependent_to.description:
Berkeley Yacc is an LALR(1) parser generator. Berkeley Yacc has been
made as compatible as possible with AT&T Yacc. Berkeley Yacc can accept
any input specification that conforms to the AT&T Yacc documentation.
Specifications that take advantage of undocumented features of AT&T Yacc
will probably be rejected.

dependent_to.name: libplist
dependent_to.description: Library for Apple Binary- and XML-Property Lists.

dependent_to.name: tempestremap
dependent_to.description:
TempestRemap is a conservative, consistent and monotone remapping
package for arbitrary grid geometry with support for finite volumes and
finite elements. There is still quite a bit of work to be done, but any
feedback is appreciated on the software in its current form

dependent_to.name: cln
dependent_to.description:
CLN is a library for efficient computations with all kinds of numbers in
arbitrary precision. It features number classes for unlimited length
integers, rationals, arbitrary precision floating point numbers and much
more.

dependent_to.name: asdcplib
dependent_to.description: AS-DCP and AS-02 File Access Library.

dependent_to.name: libcircle
dependent_to.description:
libcircle provides an efficient distributed queue on a cluster, using
self-stabilizing work stealing.

dependent_to.name: abyss
dependent_to.description:
ABySS is a de novo, parallel, paired-end sequence assembler that is
designed for short reads. The single-processor version is useful for
assembling genomes up to 100 Mbases in size.

dependent_to.name: tesseract
dependent_to.description: Tesseract Open Source OCR Engine.

dependent_to.name: sblim-sfcc
dependent_to.description: Small Footprint CIM Client Library

dependent_to.name: kea
dependent_to.description: Modern, open source DHCPv4 & DHCPv6 server.

dependent_to.name: mongo-c-driver
dependent_to.description: libmongoc is a client library written in C for MongoDB.

dependent_to.name: mpir
dependent_to.description: Multiple Precision Integers and Rationals.

dependent_to.name: mochi-margo
dependent_to.description:
A library that provides Argobots bindings to the Mercury RPC
implementation.

dependent_to.name: gtk-doc
dependent_to.description:
GtkDoc is a tool used to extract API documentation from C-code like
Doxygen, but handles documentation of GObject (including signals and
properties) that makes it very suitable for GTK+ apps and libraries. It
uses docbook for intermediate files and can produce html by default and
pdf/man-pages with some extra work.

dependent_to.name: libp11
dependent_to.description:
The PKCS#11 API is an abstract API to perform operations on
cryptographic objects such as private keys, without requiring access to
the objects themselves. That is, it provides a logical separation of the
keys from the operations. The PKCS #11 API is mainly used to access
objects in smart cards and Hardware or Software Security Modules (HSMs).
That is because in these modules the cryptographic keys are isolated in
hardware or software and are not made available to the applications
using them.

dependent_to.name: hssp
dependent_to.description:
The source code for building the mkhssp and hsspconv programs is bundled
in the hssp project. The mkhssp executable creates stockholm files with
hssp annotations in them. The hsspconv executable converts stockholm to
the original hssp format.

dependent_to.name: swiftsim
dependent_to.description:
SPH With Inter-dependent Fine-grained Tasking (SWIFT) provides
astrophysicists with a state of the art framework to perform particle
based simulations.

dependent_to.name: masa
dependent_to.description:
MASA (Manufactured Analytical Solution Abstraction) is a library written
in C++ (with C, python and Fortran90 interfaces) which provides a suite
of manufactured solutions for the software verification of partial
differential equation solvers in multiple dimensions.

dependent_to.name: procps
dependent_to.description:
Command line and full screen utilities for browsing procfs, a "pseudo"
file system dynamically generated by the kernel to provide information
about the status of entries in its process table.

dependent_to.name: osmctools
dependent_to.description:
A few really fast tools to convert, filter and update OpenStreetMap data
files

dependent_to.name: logrotate
dependent_to.description:
The logrotate utility is designed to simplify the administration of log
files on a system which generates a lot of log files.

dependent_to.name: adios
dependent_to.description:
The Adaptable IO System (ADIOS) provides a simple, flexible way for
scientists to describe the data in their code that may need to be
written, read, or processed outside of the running simulation.

dependent_to.name: wsmancli
dependent_to.description: Openwsman command line client

dependent_to.name: ima-evm-utils
dependent_to.description: IMA/EVM control utilities.

dependent_to.name: libquo
dependent_to.description:
QUO (as in "status quo") is a runtime library that aids in accommodating
thread-level heterogeneity in dynamic, phased MPI+X applications
comprising single- and multi-threaded libraries.

dependent_to.name: adlbx
dependent_to.description: ADLB/X: Master-worker library + work stealing and data dependencies

dependent_to.name: libsharp
dependent_to.description:
Libsharp is a code library for spherical harmonic transforms (SHTs) and
spin-weighted spherical harmonic transforms, which evolved from the
libpsht library.

dependent_to.name: ngspice
dependent_to.description:
ngspice is the open source spice simulator for electric and electronic
circuits.

dependent_to.name: darshan-util
dependent_to.description:
Darshan (util) is collection of tools for parsing and summarizing log
files produced by Darshan (runtime) instrumentation. This package is
typically installed on systems (front-end) where you intend to analyze
log files produced by Darshan (runtime).

dependent_to.name: dash
dependent_to.description: The Debian Almquist Shell.

dependent_to.name: genesis
dependent_to.description:
GENESIS is a Molecular dynamics and modeling software for bimolecular
systems such as proteins, lipids, glycans, and their complexes.

dependent_to.name: oci-systemd-hook
dependent_to.description:
OCI systemd hook enables users to run systemd in docker and OCI
compatible runtimes such as runc without requiring --privileged flag.

dependent_to.name: libmnl
dependent_to.description:
libmnl is a minimalistic user-space library oriented to Netlink
developers.There are a lot of common tasks in parsing, validating,
constructing of both the Netlink header and TLVs that are repetitive and
easy to get wrong.This library aims to provide simple helpers that
allows you to re-use code and to avoid re-inventing the wheel.

dependent_to.name: gmp
dependent_to.description:
GMP is a free library for arbitrary precision arithmetic, operating on
signed integers, rational numbers, and floating-point numbers.

dependent_to.name: metaphysicl
dependent_to.description:
Metaprogramming and operator-overloaded classes for numerical
simulations.

dependent_to.name: libatasmart
dependent_to.description:
A small and lightweight parser library for ATA S.M.A.R.T. hard disk
health monitoring.

dependent_to.name: cunit
dependent_to.description: Automated testing framework for 'C'.

dependent_to.name: sst-core
dependent_to.description:
The Structural Simulation Toolkit (SST) core provides a parallel
discrete event simulation (PDES) framework for performing architecture
simulations of existing and proposed HPC systems

dependent_to.name: prng
dependent_to.description: Pseudo-Random Number Generator library.

dependent_to.name: libspiro
dependent_to.description:
Spiro is the creation of Raph Levien. It simplifies the drawing of
beautiful curves.

dependent_to.name: libuv
dependent_to.description: Multi-platform library with a focus on asynchronous IO

dependent_to.name: rose
dependent_to.description:
A compiler infrastructure to build source-to-source program
transformation and analysis tools. (Developed at Lawrence Livermore
National Lab)

dependent_to.name: lxc
dependent_to.description:
LXC is the well-known and heavily tested low-level Linux container
runtime. It is in active development since 2008 and has proven itself in
critical production environments world-wide. Some of its core
contributors are the same people that helped to implement various well-
known containerization features inside the Linux kernel.

dependent_to.name: pmix
dependent_to.description:
The Process Management Interface (PMI) has been used for quite some time
as a means of exchanging wireup information needed for interprocess
communication. However, meeting the significant orchestration challenges
presented by exascale systems requires that the process-to-system
interface evolve to permit a tighter integration between the different
components of the parallel application and existing and future SMS
solutions. PMI Exascale (PMIx) addresses these needs by providing an
extended version of the PMI definitions specifically designed to support
exascale and beyond environments by: (a) adding flexibility to the
functionality expressed in the existing APIs, (b) augmenting the
interfaces with new APIs that provide extended capabilities, (c) forging
a collaboration between subsystem providers including resource manager,
fabric, file system, and programming library developers, (d)
establishing a standards-like body for maintaining the definitions, and
(e) providing a reference implementation of the PMIx standard that
demonstrates the desired level of scalability while maintaining strict
separation between it and the standard itself.

dependent_to.name: pmerge
dependent_to.description:
PMERGE implements a new method that identifies candidate PSVs by
building networks of loci that share high levels of nucleotide
similarity. The PMERGE is embedded in the analysis pipeline of the
widely used Stacks software, and it is straightforward to apply it as an
additional filter in population-genomic studies using RAD-seq data.

dependent_to.name: libmaus2
dependent_to.description: libmaus2 is a collection of data structures and algorithmse.

dependent_to.name: flex
dependent_to.description: Flex is a tool for generating scanners.
